name: get_weather_alerts
description: Fetches recent alerts and warnings issued by government agencies (USA, UK, Europe, and Rest of the World) for the location using the WeatherAPI.

q.description:
Query parameter based on which data is sent back. It could be the following:
- Latitude and Longitude (Decimal degree) e.g: q=48.8567,2.3508
- location e.g.: q=Paris (must be in English)
- US zip e.g.: q=10001
- UK postcode e.g: q=SW1
- Canada postal code e.g: q=G2J
- metar:<metar code> e.g: q=metar:EGLL
- iata:<3 digit airport code> e.g: q=iata:DXB
- auto:ip IP lookup e.g: q=auto:ip
- IP address (IPv4 and IPv6 supported) e.g: q=100.0.0.1
